<<<<<<< HEAD
A lamentable ballad of the Lady's fall. Tune is, In pescod time.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill. (woodcuts).
Printed for W[illiam]. Thackeray, at the Angel in Duck-Lane, E[lizabeth]. M[illet]. and A[lexander]. M[ilbourn]., [London] : [1692]
Verse: "Mark well my heavy soleful tale ..." Place, date of publication and publisher's names from Wing. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
=======
